ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <3> Spare LP-E12 Battery for Canon +
<4> Battery Charger for LP-E12 + <5> PD 58mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <6> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control +
<7> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <8> Canon 100EG DSLR Gadget Bag + <9> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <10> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <14> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with 64GB Card + Battery & Charger + Case + Tele/Wide Lenses + Filters + Tripod Kit
